title: Picturesque views - right outside your window! Visit today!
posting_body: ['Community Location:', '100 Walden Brook Drive - Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Rental Information:', '$2022/Month | 3 Bedroom 2 Bath | 1425 - 1532 sq ft', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ All electric', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Handrails', '➢ Office', '➢ Oven', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Window Coverings', '➢ 9 foot ceiling', '➢ Broadband access', '➢ Crown Molding', '➢ Deck', '➢ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Large walk-in closets', '➢ Upgrade Unit', '➢ Views', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Property Features:', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gameroom', '➢ Laundry Facility', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Porch', '➢ Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ Car Care Center', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Detached garages', '➢ Lake view', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Description:', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park.", 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Call:', 'Walden Brook at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2FF46CF1E7DD47']
